data.title: Production Studios in New York
data.meta_description: The Manhattan Center offers deluxe recording studios and production in New York. For film scoring and album recording services contact them today.
data.text:
NEW YORK PRODUCTION STUDIOS

These experts include Marvin Williams, Manhattan Center’s Director of Engineering & Operations. Known for his work as a principal cameraman, Marvin also oversees and maintains an enormous array of state-of-the-art equipment including Ikegami HD cameras and monitors, an internal system of fiber connectivity and the new control console featured in the recent $1,000,000 renovation of Studio-7.

Joining Marvin is John Terracciano, who leads the Operation side of Production at Manhattan Center. From managing a 24-hour global news network to running technical operations for “Cold Pizza”, John and his crew of talented pros have done it all for every and any size production. This comprehensive operational knowledge of TV production allows us to help you staff, manage, schedule and coordinate every technical aspect of your production.

Obie O’Brien, who heads our Audio & Video Production group, adeptly manages our production studios in New York including: The Hammerstein Ballroom and The Grand Ballroom sound stages and the world-renowned Studio-7 — known for decades as the must-have venue for Broadway cast albums and Academey Award winning film scores.

Show less
